about_the_game:
[GAME IS WORK IN PROGRESS - GRAPHIC IS UPDATING OVER TIME]

Think carefully about how you build your hotel and offer your customers a good experience!

Customise your hotel with different rooms to suit everyone's needs!


  • Hotelroom
  • Toilet
  • Restaurant
  • Gym

You will need specific rooms for your work. You and your employees will benefit from these rooms


  • Reception
  • Kitchen
  • Workers Room

In order for your hotel to be successful and rank up in Star Rating, you must invest in good products and service!


  • Buy good quality furniture
  • Change the appearance of the walls
  • Buy high quality food
  • Expensive fitness equipment lasts longer

It's not always relaxed. The more guests, the more stress!

Hire employees and expand your hotel for the best possible satisfaction of your guests


  • Cook food for your guests
  • Deliver food ordered via phone call
  • Repair damaged furniture and equipment
  • Clean the rooms
  • Sweep the hallways

If you like the game concept, adding the game to your wishlist will help me enormously!

♥ THANK YOU ♥

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1
  • Processor: 1.5 GHz Dual-Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 1000 Series
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: Build, renovate and manage your hotel to keep your guests happy. Increase your star rating, but be careful - unhappy guests leave bad reviews and you don't want to lose your hotel!
supported_languages:
English*, German
*languages with full audio support
